text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with cream cheese frosting and yes
this is the frosting you saw on our
delicious red velvet cupcakes and is
this the easiest recipe we've ever done
maybe one of them so here we go in a
mixing bowl we're gonna put in some soft
butter now mine was a little too soft I
forgot to take it out put it next to the
stove so it kind of melted a little you
don't want melted butter
so just soft butter room temperature
cream cheese and a little splash of
vanilla so I'm gonna use the whisk
attachment and I apologize I did not get
one of the electric mixers that has a
light inside so it's a little dark but
you get the idea and I'm gonna cream
that together until it looks like that
alright so once your butter vanilla and
cream cheese are all creamed together
and it's kind of light and fluffy I'm
gonna scrape down the attachment and
we're gonna add the last ingredient
which is powdered sugar now the amount
of powdered sugar that goes in this can
really vary for that amount of butter
and cream cheese you can go anywhere
from a cup to 3 cups of powdered sugar
alright it really depends on how you
like it so don't be afraid to experiment
with the amount of powdered sugar all
right so we're gonna add that in and
we're gonna start blending a little slow
to begin otherwise you're gonna look
like one of those you know kabuki
dancers and once it starts to come
together you can go a little faster and
then go ahead and crank that puppy up
too high and when it's all whipped in
you're done and of course like I always
tell ya when you using one of these
things you got to stop once in a while
scrape down the sides make sure you're
getting everything mixed in there
properly and of course you can do this
by hand it's just a little easier in the
electric stand mixer and you know what
we all love easier that's why we
invented the internet in the first place
ok I finished whipping it together and
when it was light and fluffy and
beautiful I was done and then one last
note at room temperature this is very
very soft easy to spread but for service
not a bad idea to refrigerate whatever
you're serving this on because that
cream cheese and butter will firm up a
little bit and it will give you a really
beautiful mouthfeel all right I'm gonna
taste and adjust for seasoning only half
that's true you know really just the
seasoning I just want to taste it and
there you go
spread it on stuff carrot cake
red velvet cupcakes by the way to the
person that told me this only goes on
carrot cake and never red velvet
cupcakes I don't think so
also if you want to put a little squeeze
of lemon in here not a bad idea you can
also do things like orange extract
ginger all right lots of ways you can
flavour this up depending on what you're
serving it with anyway there you go a
quick and easy cream-cheese frosting
recipe all the ingredients are on food
wishes calm as usual and as always enjoy
